org.lindbergframework.core.configuration
Interface Configuration

All Known Subinterfaces:
CoreConfiguration, LinpConfiguration, ValidationConfiguration, WebCoreConfiguration
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCoreConfiguration, AbstractLinpConfiguration, AbstractValidationConfigurarion, ClassPathXmlCoreConfiguration, ConfigurationRepository, CoreContext, LinpContext, SimpleCoreConfiguration, SimpleLinpConfiguration, WebClassPathXmlCoreConfiguration, XmlCoreConfiguration, XmlLinpConfiguration, XmlValidationConfiguration
public interface Configuration

Interface that defines the contract for lindberg configuration.

Author:
Victor Lindberg
